mapper.select: SELECT MILE_HISTORY_SEQ AS mileHistorySeq, USER_ID AS userId, TRX_TYPE AS trxType, TRX_AMT AS trxAmt, BALANCE_AFTER_TRX AS balanceAfterTrx, TRX_DT AS trxDt FROM MILEAGE_HISTORY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY TRX_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MILEAGE_HISTORY (USER_ID, TRX_TYPE, TRX_AMT, BALANCE_AFTER_TRX, TRX_DT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{trxType}, #{trxAmt}, #{balanceAfterTrx}, SYSDATE)
